00007 #define GENERATE 0

00018 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00019 {
00020   char buf[BUFLEN];
00021   sockaddr_in server_sa, client_sa;
00022   struct hostent *he;
00023   int fd, rc;
00024 
00025   if (argc!=4) {
00026     usage();
00027     exit(-1);
00028   }
00029 
00030   if (toupper(argv[1][0])=='K') {
00031     cerr << "Using kernel stack.\n";
00032     if (minet_init(MINET_KERNEL)<0) {
00033       cerr << "Stack initialization failed.\n";
00034       goto err;
00035     } else {
00036       cerr << "Stack initialized.\n";
00037     }
00038   } else {
00039     cerr << "Using Minet User Level Stack.\n";
00040     if (minet_init(MINET_USER)<0) {
00041       cerr << "Stack initialization failed.\n";
00042       goto err;
00043     } else {
00044       cerr << "Stack initialized.\n";
00045     }
00046   }
00047 
00048   cerr << "Stack initialized.\n";
00049 
00050   he = gethostbyname(argv[2]);
00051 
00052   if (he==0) {
00053     cerr << "Unknown host.\n";
00054     goto err;
00055   }
00056   bzero(&server_sa,sizeof(server_sa));
00057   server_sa.sin_family=AF_INET;
00058   memcpy((void*)(&(server_sa.sin_addr)),he->h_addr,he->h_length);
00059   server_sa.sin_port=htons(atoi(argv[3]));
00060 
00061   fd = minet_socket(SOCK_DGRAM);
00062 
00063   if (fd<0) {
00064     cerr << "Can't create socket.\n";
00065     minet_perror("reason:");
00066     goto err;
00067   } else {
00068     cerr << "Socket created.\n";
00069   }
00070 
00071   bzero(&client_sa,sizeof(client_sa));
00072   client_sa.sin_family=AF_INET;
00073   client_sa.sin_addr.s_addr=htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00074   client_sa.sin_port=htons(0);
00075 
00076   if (minet_bind(fd,&client_sa)<0) {
00077     cerr << "Can't bind socket.\n";
00078     minet_perror("reason:");
00079     goto err;
00080   } else {
00081     cerr << "Socket bound.\n";
00082   }
00083 
00084   if (minet_connect(fd,&server_sa)<0) {
00085     cerr << "Can't connect socket.\n";
00086     minet_perror("reason:");
00087     goto err;
00088   } else {
00089     cerr << "Socket connected.\n";
00090   }
00091 
00092   cout << "Enter text to send.\n";
00093 
00094   while (1) {
00095 #if GENERATE
00096     sleep(1);
00097     for (int i=0;i<BUFLEN;i++) {
00098       buf[i]='a'+i%26;
00099     }
00100     buf[BUFLEN-1]='\n';
00101     rc=BUFLEN;
00102 #else
00103     if ((rc=read(fileno(stdin),buf,BUFLEN))<0) {
00104       cerr << "Read failed.\n";
00105       minet_perror("reason:");
00106       goto err;
00107     }
00108 #endif
00109     if (rc==0) {
00110       cerr << "Done.\n";
00111       goto done;
00112     }
00113     if (minet_write(fd,buf,rc)<0) {
00114       cerr << "Write failed.\n";
00115       minet_perror("reason:");
00116       goto err;
00117     }
00118   }
00119 
00120  done:
00121  err:
00122   minet_close(fd);
00123   minet_deinit();
00124   return 0;
00125 }
